inclusion.criterion: Home bound at a home health agency
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to operate the telehome care system
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Agreeable to have the telehome care system installed at residence for 60 days
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Residing in an environment where care can be provided safely
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Not eligible for home health care
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: With a clinical diagnosis of a medical condition other than obstructive pulmonary disease, chronic heart failure, uncontrolled hypertension, diabetes mellitus and taking anti-hyperglycemic oral therapy
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient tolerated an inpatient sildenafil trial without hypotension.
